libsoft wrote:
>
>     Check out: http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#windows.  Also, for
>     sure
>     you have connectivity to a working DNS server on the crawl box?
>
>     St.Ack
>
>
>  What do you mean "a working DNS server on the crawl box"? I must 
> install a DNS server on my Windows box to run Heritrix?

Does DNS work on that box?  Can you do lookups from the host running 
Heritrix and have them succeed (This is probably not your issue though 
you should for sure verify.  Your issue is more likely that of the FAQ I 
pointed  you to).

St.Ack
